thread.title: BRIEF-8Point3 Energy Says Sunpower Sold Interest In Boulder Solar Project ​

title: BRIEF-8Point3 Energy Says Sunpower Sold Interest In Boulder Solar Project ​

organizations.name: brief-8point3 energy says sunpower sold interest in boulder solar project

text: February 16, 2018 / 11:35 AM / in 16 minutes BRIEF-8Point3 Energy Says Sunpower Sold Interest In Boulder Solar Project ​ Reuters Staff 1 Min Read Feb 16 (Reuters) - 8Point3 Energy Partners Lp: * 8POINT3 ENERGY PARTNERS - ON‍ FEB 15, SUNPOWER SOLD INTEREST IN BOULDER SOLAR PROJECT THAT WAS SUBJECT TO RIGHT OF FIRST OFFER AGREEMENT TO THIRD PARTY​ * 8POINT3 ENERGY SAYS CO'S UNIT NO LONGER HAS ABILITY TO BUY INTEREST IN BOULDER SOLAR PROJECT/RELATED ASSETS FROM SUNPOWER - SEC FILING Source text: ( bit.ly/2o5etO5 ) Further company coverage:
